ask_questions.en: Ask about card selection and reward options.
ask_questions.ko: Ask about card selection and reward options.

q_best_card.en: Which card is best for me?
q_best_card.ko: Which card is best for me?

q_current_value.en: Which option is better for my values?
q_current_value.ko: Which option is better for my values?

tooltip_housing_points.en:
Housing-only: Housing x Multiplier (0~1.25X)
Multiplier determined by Everyday Spend Ratio

Flexible: Unlock with Bilt Cash
$3 Cash = 100 points (max 1X)
tooltip_housing_points.ko:
Housing-only: Housing x Multiplier (0~1.25X)
Multiplier = Everyday Spend Ratio

Flexible: Bilt Cash
$3 Cash = 100 points (max 1X)

tooltip_everyday_points.en:
Blue: Everyday Spend x 1X
Obsidian: Avg 1.5X (Travel 2X, Dining/Grocery 3X)
Palladium: Everyday Spend x 2X
tooltip_everyday_points.ko:
Blue: Everyday Spend x 1X
Obsidian: Avg 1.5X (Travel 2X, Dining/Grocery 3X)
Palladium: Everyday Spend x 2X

tooltip_monthly_cash.en:
Flexible option only
Everyday Spend x 4% = Bilt Cash

No Bilt Cash earned with Housing-only option
tooltip_monthly_cash.ko:
Flexible option only
Everyday Spend x 4% = Bilt Cash

No Bilt Cash with Housing-only option

tooltip_remaining_cash.en:
Remaining Bilt Cash after unlocking housing points

Calculation: Monthly Cash - (Unlocked Points / 100 x $3)

Remaining Cash can be used for other purposes
tooltip_remaining_cash.ko:
Remaining Bilt Cash after unlocking housing points

Calculation: Monthly Cash - (Unlocked Points / 100 x $3)

Remaining Cash can be used for other purposes

tooltip_annual_value.en:
Formula:
(Annual Points x $0.015) + Annual Remaining Cash + Annual Benefits - Annual Fee

Point Value: 1 point = 1.5 cents (conservative)
Annual Benefits: Obsidian $100, Palladium $600
tooltip_annual_value.ko:
Formula:
(Annual Points x $0.015) + Annual Remaining Cash + Annual Benefits - Annual Fee

Point Value: 1 point = 1.5 cents (conservative)
Annual Benefits: Obsidian $100, Palladium $600

tooltip_spend_ratio.en:
Everyday Spend / Housing x 100%

Determines housing points multiplier in Housing-only option
tooltip_spend_ratio.ko:
Everyday Spend / Housing x 100%

Determines housing points multiplier in Housing-only option

tooltip_annual_points.en: (Monthly Housing Points + Monthly Everyday Points) x 12 months
tooltip_annual_points.ko: (Monthly Housing Points + Monthly Everyday Points) x 12 months

tooltip_housing_input.en:
Bilt Housing Payments
Rent or mortgage paid through Bilt App

Also includes:
- HOA dues
- Utilities
- Property taxes
- Amenity fees
- Gym fees
tooltip_housing_input.ko:
Bilt Housing Payments
Rent or mortgage paid through Bilt App

Also includes:
- HOA dues
- Utilities
- Property taxes
- Amenity fees
- Gym fees

tooltip_everyday_input.en:
Amount you plan to spend with Bilt Card
All purchases except housing payments

Excludes:
- Gift cards, prepaid cards
- P2P (Venmo, PayPal, Zelle)
- Crypto purchases
- Cash advances
tooltip_everyday_input.ko:
Amount you plan to spend with Bilt Card
All purchases except housing payments

Excludes:
- Gift cards, prepaid cards
- P2P (Venmo, PayPal, Zelle)
- Crypto purchases
- Cash advances
